message:
I'm not familiar with MVVM Light loc services, but in a WPF app you don't have to be as careful about using `Task.Run`. UI apps have the entire thread pool at their disposal; ASP.NET requests have to be more careful since they share the pool with others. This is why I do not recommend Task.Run in any reusable/generic library code.

In your case, you could probably just use a single Task.Run at the top and that would be fine. I wouldn't worry about the blocking calls further down because they'd just be blocking a thread pool thread.
